alert.note: Alert for Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 1:55PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tishomingo County through 230 PM CDT... At 155 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Iuka, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Iuka, Bacon Springs, Blythe Crossing and Oldham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
